ksdk:manifest.name: EVK-MIMX8MN
ksdk:manifest.brief: This is SDK version 2.6.1 manifest file. It describes the content of the EVK-MIMX8MN and additional settings for tools that support SDK version 2.6.1

board.name: EVK-MIMX8MN
board.description: The evkmimx8mn is an development platform for MIMX8MN1, MIMX8MN2, MIMX8MN3, MIMX8MN4, MIMX8MN5, MIMX8MN6 MCUs

specific.content: The i.MX 8M Nano family of boards provides a powerful and flexible development system for NXPÂ®'s Cortex-M7 MCUs.

device.name: MIMX8MN6
device.description: The MIMX8MN6 are ARM Cortex-M7 and Cortex-A53 based microcontrollers for embedded applications.

specific.content: The MIMX8MN6 are ARM Cortex-M7 and Cortex-A53 based microcontrollers for embedded applications.
